item.description:
Three high-school friends make a discovery that gives them incredible superpowers, but their lives spin out of control when their darker sides begin to emerge.

  • Director: Jay Alaimo
  • Genres: Action/Adventure, Sci-Fi/Fantasy

This is a "Teenagers being teenagers and things go pear-shaped quickly" film, with apparently good effects.

As this is the opening weekend, always a good idea to get tickets ahead of time.

After an extensive search, through all possible means, it appears it isn't showing at Loews Boston Common 19, but the Regal Fenway 13.

We'll meet in the ticket lobby, and be seeing the 7:00pm show. Sorry for the change, and see you then.

If you miss us before going in, we'll hang out outside the theatre for a bit for pottybreaks before venturing for a late dinner. I'm not too familiar with that area, so if anyone has ideas for dinner places for a medium sized group, I'll take suggestions.

If you choose to join us for dinner, PLEASE, bring cash to make the waiters happy, and speed up the money handling portion of dinner.

See you then!!!!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll most probably be upstairs, by the windows, though the theatre and time have NOT BEEN POSTED YET for Boston. This time is just an estimate, and will update closer to the event. I just wanted to get it before Doreen. Neener.
item.name: Chronicle
